ability_description.SOFT_BOILED: Cures every status effects and grants [20,40,80,SP] SHIELD for every ally
ability_description.EARTHQUAKE: Deals damage [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy units in the same column/line of the attacker
ability_description.SONG_OF_DESIRE: The target is CONFUSION for [6,SP] seconds
ability_description.CONFUSING_MIND: Deals [40,SP] SPECIAL to the target and its adjacent pokemons, making them CONFUSION for 3 seconds
ability_description.KNOWLEDGE_THIEF: Launch the ultimate of the target
ability_description.KING_SHIELD: PROTECT the user for [1,2,3] seconds and swap his position with the farthest enemy
ability_description.EXPLOSION: Deals [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL to all adjacent enemies. Also damage the user.
ability_description.NIGHTMARE: POISON the whole enemy team for [2,4,8,SP=0.5] seconds
ability_description.CLANGOROUS_SOUL: Buff the adjacent allies with [2,4,8] ATK and [1,2,4]DEF / SPE_DEF
ability_description.BONEMERANG: Throw a boomerang bone through the enemy team, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL on its way
ability_description.GROWL: Apply WOUND status on the entire enemy team for [3,6,9] seconds
ability_description.RELIC_SONG: Put SLEEP the whole enemy team for [2,SP=0.5] seconds
ability_description.DISARMING_VOICE: Gives [10,20,40,SP=0.5] MANA to all allies except the caster
ability_description.HIGH_JUMP_KICK: Deals [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL and steal all MANA from its target
ability_description.TRI_ATTACK: Deals [25,50,100,SP] special damage. BURN, FREEZE and WOUND the target for [2,3,5] seconds
ability_description.ECHO: Deals [3,6,9,SP] SPECIAL to the enemy team, increasing by [3,6,9,SP] every time the pokemon uses its ability
ability_description.HYPER_VOICE: Deals [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL on a row and make all targets hit CONFUSION for [1,2,3] seconds
ability_description.SHADOW_CLONE: The pokemon creates an identical clone of himself next to his target. This clone inherits from the pokemon items and stats, 80% of its max HP and [30,SP] SHIELD
ability_description.VOLT_SWITCH: Dash into the enemy backline, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.LIQUIDATION: Deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL and remove [1,2,4]DEF from the target
ability_description.BURN: BURN the whole enemy team for [5,10,20] seconds
ability_description.POISON: Apply POISON to [1,2,3] closest opponents for [3,6,9,SP=0.5] seconds
ability_description.SLEEP: Put SLEEP 2 enemies in the back lines for [1.5,3,4.5] seconds
ability_description.SILENCE: SILENCE the whole enemy team for [2,4,8] seconds
ability_description.PROTECT: PROTECT the user, becoming invulnerable for [5,SP=0.5] seconds.
ability_description.FREEZE: FREEZE the whole enemy team for [1,2,3] seconds
ability_description.CONFUSION: Makes the target CONFUSION for [3,5,7] seconds. If the target is already CONFUSION, deals [75,150,300,SP] SPECIAL instead
ability_description.FIRE_BLAST: Throw a fire blast for [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.WHEEL_OF_FIRE: Sends a fire wheel that makes a round trip doing [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.SEISMIC_TOSS: Mono target attack that deals [7,14,28,SP] TRUE multiplied by the number of Pokemon in your team
ability_description.GUILLOTINE: Mono target attack that deals [1,2,3,SP] x ATK SPECIAL. Restores half MANA if target is KO
ability_description.ROCK_SLIDE: Mono target attack that deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL. Doubles damage if target is type flying.
ability_description.HEAT_WAVE: Area of effect attack that deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in a line behind the target.
ability_description.THUNDER: Mono target damage that deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.HYDRO_PUMP: Area of effect attack that deals [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in a line behind the target.
ability_description.DRACO_METEOR: Area of effect attack that deals [50,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies
ability_description.SOAK: Deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL and restores 10 MANA to friendly pokemons
ability_description.ORIGIN_PULSE: A wave travels horizontally across the battlefield doing [120,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.SEED_FLARE: Shaymins body emits a shock wave, dealing [30,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies, and decreasing their SPE_DEF by 2
ability_description.IRON_TAIL: Mono target damage attack that deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL. Buff DEF by [1,3,5] points
ability_description.BLAST_BURN: Area of effect attack that deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.CHARGE: Buff all electric ally pokemons ATK by [20,SP] %
ability_description.DISCHARGE: Shock nearby enemies for [25,50,75,SP] SPECIAL and make themPARALYSIS for 5 seconds
ability_description.BITE: Deals [40,80,120,SP] SPECIAL damage to the target and heals for 30% of the damage
ability_description.DRAGON_TAIL: Mono target attack that deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and buffDEF and SPE_DEF by [1,2,3,SP]
ability_description.DRAGON_BREATH: Area of effect attack that deals [30,60,120,SP] TRUE in a line behind the target
ability_description.ICICLE_CRASH: Area of effect attack that deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL around the target
ability_description.ROOT: Heal all nearby ally pokemons by [20,40,80,SP] HP
ability_description.STOMP: Mono target that deals [3,4,5,SP] x ATK SPECIAL
ability_description.PAYBACK: Life drain target attack that deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.NIGHT_SLASH: Mono-target attack that does [40,60,100,SP] SPECIAL. Decreases the DEF of all enemies by 1 point
ability_description.BUG_BUZZ: Mono target attack that does [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL. Double damage if target is PARALYSIS
ability_description.STRING_SHOT: Mono target attack that does [10,20,50,SP] SPECIAL and make PARALYSIS for 5 seconds
ability_description.VENOSHOCK: Mono target damage that deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL. Doubles damage if target is POISON
ability_description.LEECH_LIFE: Area of effect life steal attack that deals [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.HAPPY_HOUR: Buff all ally ATK by [2,5,8,SP] points
ability_description.TELEPORT: Teleport the pokemon on one edge of the map. Next attack deals [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.THIEF: Steals all the target's items the holder can carry and deals [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.STUN_SPORE: Decrease target ATK_SPEED by [10,20,40] % and deals [5,10,20,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.METEOR_MASH: Area of effect around the target that deals [30,50,70,SP] SPECIAL. Buff pokemon ATK by [5,SP].
ability_description.HURRICANE: Area of effect attack that deals [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL in a line behind the target and makePARALYSIS for 4 seconds
ability_description.HEAL_BLOCK: Apply WOUND to all adjacent enemies for [5,10,15] seconds
ability_description.ROAR_OF_TIME: Give RESURECTION to the pokemon that has the most items in your team.
ability_description.ROCK_TOMB: Mono target attack that deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and decrease target ATK_SPEED by [10,20,40] %
ability_description.ROCK_SMASH: Mono target attack that deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL and SILENCE target for [3,6,9] seconds
ability_description.HEAD_SMASH: The pokemon hurts itself for [5,10,15,SP] HP and deals [40,80,150,SP] SPECIAL. Execute if the target is SLEEP or FREEZE
ability_description.CORRUPTED_NATURE: WOUND adjacent enemies for 5 seconds and deals [20,40,80,SP] life steal SPECIAL
ability_description.CRABHAMMER: Deals [40,80,120,SP] SPECIAL. High chance of crit. Execute the target if below 30%
ability_description.DIAMOND_STORM: Deals [200,SP]% of currentDEF as special damage to surrounding enemies
ability_description.DRACO_ENERGY: Deals [100,SP] % of regidraco HP as SPECIAL
ability_description.DYNAMAX_CANNON: Shoot a dynamax beam on a straight line, dealing to every pokemon hit [80,SP] % of their HP as SPECIAL
ability_description.DYNAMIC_PUNCH: Deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL and make the target CONFUSION for [1.5,3,6] seconds
ability_description.ELECTRO_BOOST: All electric allies receive RUNE_PROTECT and are immune to special damage and status alterations for 5s
ability_description.FIRE_TRICK: Deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL and teleports the target to a corner of the map
ability_description.FLAME_CHARGE: Dash into the enemy backline, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.LEECH_SEED: POISON the target for [3,6,12] seconds, healing for [20,40,80,SP] HP
ability_description.LOCK_ON: Lock the target and give it ARMOR_REDUCTION for 8s. Genesect now deals TRUE to it
ability_description.PSYCH_UP: Deal [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL and SILENCE the target and its adjacent enemies
ability_description.RAZOR_WIND: Deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and make surounding enemiesPARALYSIS
ability_description.TWISTING_NETHER: Deals [80,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemies. Every pokemon hit is teleported somewhere.
ability_description.WONDER_GUARD: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and make all adjacent enemiesPARALYSIS for [5,SP] seconds
ability_description.ELECTRIC_SURGE: Increase ATK_SPEED of all Electric pokemons by [10,SP]%
ability_description.PSYCHIC_SURGE: Increase AP of all Psychic pokemons by [5,SP]%, except the caster
ability_description.MIND_BLOWN: Deals [50,SP] % of target current HP as SPECIAL
ability_description.PAYDAY: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL. If the target is KO, the player receive [1,2,3] gold
ability_description.BLUE_FLARE: Inflicts [50,SP] SPECIAL + 20 per stage of fire synergy
ability_description.FUSION_BOLT: Inflicts [50,SP] SPECIAL + 40 per stage of electric synergy
ability_description.AURORA_VEIL: All allies receive RUNE_PROTECT and are immune to special damage and status alterations for [1.5,2.5,3.5] seconds
ability_description.AQUA_JET: Dash into the enemy backline, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.JUDGEMENT: Inflicts [10,SP] special damage to the target, multiplied by the sum of Arceus synergy levels
ability_description.CHATTER: Deal [10,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies. Every enemy has [30,SP]% chance to be CONFUSION for 1 second
ability_description.STEAM_ERUPTION: Deals [80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and all enemies adjacent, and BURN them for 3 seconds
ability_description.APPLE_ACID: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target, and lower its SPE_DEF by 3 points
ability_description.SHADOW_BALL: Deals [45,90,180,SP] SPECIAL and burn 15 MANA to the target and adjacent enemies
ability_description.DIVE: Dives underwater and reappears in the middle of the enemy team, dealing [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL and FREEZE all adjacent units for 1.5 second
ability_description.SPIKE_ARMOR: For [3,5,10] seconds, targets that melee attack this Pokémon receive WOUND and take SPECIAL equal to [100,SP]% of current DEF
ability_description.FAKE_TEARS: Deals [3,6,9,SP] SPECIAL to the whole enemy team and trigger ARMOR_REDUCTION for 3s
ability_description.SPARKLING_ARIA: Deals [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL to the target and adjacent enemies. If adjacent allies are BURN, the burn is healed.
ability_description.DRAGON_DARTS: Throws 3 darts that deals [10,25,50,SP] SPECIAL each to the target. If the target dies, regain 40 MANA.
ability_description.GRASSY_SURGE: Increase ATK of all Grass pokemons by [5,SP]
ability_description.MISTY_SURGE: Increase SPE_DEF of all Fairy pokemons by [5,SP]
ability_description.SKY_ATTACK: Rises in the air and fall on the farthest target, PROTECT the attacker for .5 second and deals [120,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.ILLUSION: User recovers [30,50,70,SP=0.5] HP points and copies the form as well as the ATK,DEF, SPE_DEF, and RANGE of the targeted Pokemon
ability_description.SMOG: BuffDEF by [1,2,4,SP] and poison adjacent enemies for 3s
ability_description.AURORA_BEAM: Fires a beam in a line. All targets hit take [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and can be FREEZE (chance based on current ice synergy)
ability_description.SPIRIT_SHACKLE: Shoots a Piercing Arrow that deals [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL in a line behind the target and applies WOUND for 4 seconds to everyone hit
ability_description.WATER_SHURIKEN: Throws 3 shuriken in 3 directions that pass through enemies and inflict [20,40,60,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.SHADOW_SNEAK: Deals [60,SP] SPECIAL. If the target is SILENCE, deals TRUE
ability_description.MACH_PUNCH: Deals [50,SP] SPECIAL and attacks immediately after
ability_description.UPPERCUT: Deals [80,SP] SPECIAL. Double damage if attacker has a betterDEF than target
ability_description.TRIPLE_KICK: Deals [50,SP] SPECIAL to up to 3 adjacent enemies
ability_description.MAWASHI_GERI: Deals [80,SP] SPECIAL. Double damage if attacker has a better ATK than target
ability_description.FORECAST: Gives [10,SP] SHIELD to your team, plus additional bonus depending on the weather
ability_description.SPECTRAL_THIEF: Disappears and reappears dealing [50, SP] SPECIAL, stealing all the statistic boost of the target
ability_description.DEATH_WING: Deals [150,SP] SPECIAL and heals for 75% of the damage taken by the target
ability_description.SLACK_OFF: Clear all negative status, heal [30,40,50,SP=0.5] % of max HP and put the caster SLEEP for 5 seconds
ability_description.DARK_VOID: Deals [30, SP] SPECIAL to all enemies. If any affected target was SILENCE, they are put SLEEP for 2 seconds
ability_description.OVERHEAT: Deals [30, SP] SPECIAL to all enemies. Double damage if target is BURN
ability_description.HYPNOSIS: Put SLEEP 1 enemy in the back lines for [2,3.5,6,SP=0.5] seconds
ability_description.MIMIC: Copies the ability of the current target
ability_description.HEX: Deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target. Doubles damage if target is BURN, CONFUSION, FREEZE,PARALYSIS, POISON, SILENCE, SLEEP or WOUND
ability_description.GROWTH: Increase body size and ATK by [10,SP]. Grows twice as fast if weather is sunny
ability_description.HEAL_ORDER: Deals [25,45,65,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemies and heal [25,45,65,SP] to adjacent allies
ability_description.SHELL_TRAP: SILENCE target for 3 seconds and removes 40 MANA from target and enemies around it
ability_description.DIG: Digs underground and reappears next to the farthest enemy, dealing [10,20,40,SP] special damage to all enemies on the way
ability_description.FIRE_SPIN: Area of effect attack that deals [20,40,100,SP] SPECIAL around the target and BURN all enemies hit for 3 seconds
ability_description.SEARING_SHOT: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. Deals [30,SP] SPECIAL and BURN for 3 seconds all enemies within 2 tiles of Victini.
ability_description.SPLASH: Just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...
ability_description.COUNTER: Pokemon lashes out at adjacent enemies dealing SPECIAL equal its missing HP (Scale with AP)
ability_description.STICKY_WEB: Deals [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL andPARALYSIS the target and adjacent enemies for 4 seconds
ability_description.SILVER_WIND: Dash into the enemy backline, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to every enemy on the path. Then gain 1 ATK, 1DEF, 1 SPE_DEF, 10% AP and 10% ATK_SPEED
ability_description.POISON_POWDER: Dash into the enemy backline, dealing [30,60,120,SP] and applying POISON for 5 seconds to every enemy on the path
ability_description.ICY_WIND: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and decrease target ATK_SPEED by [10,20,40]%
ability_description.GIGATON_HAMMER: Deals [100,200,400,SP] SPECIAL but SILENCE itself for 6 seconds
ability_description.ACROBATICS: Deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL. Double damage if caster has no held items.
ability_description.ABSORB: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and heals [3,6,12,SP] to adjacent allies
ability_description.ROLLOUT: Buff theDEF by [5,SP] and deals 6x theDEF as SPECIAL
ability_description.THRASH: Buff ATK by 110% and become CONFUSION for 3s
ability_description.SOLAR_BEAM: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL in a straight line behind the target. If the weather is sunny, targets are BURN for 3s and restores 40 MANA
ability_description.MAGMA_STORM: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that deals [80,SP] SPECIAL before moving to an adjacent target
ability_description.SLASHING_CLAW: Deals [15,30,60,SP] to the target and WOUND it for 5 seconds. If the target is already WOUND, deals 30% bonus SPECIAL
ability_description.ERUPTION: Fires [20,30,40] projectiles in the air. Every projectile deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and BURN for 5 seconds
ability_description.LUSTER_PURGE: Launches a ball of light in a straight line that deals [25,SP] SPECIAL twice and lowers twice the SPE_DEF of all enemies hit by 1
ability_description.MIST_BALL: Launches a mist bubble in a straight line that deals [25,SP] SPECIAL twice and lowers twice the AP of all enemies hit by 10%
ability_description.LINK_CABLE: Dash into a new spot, then triggers an electric arc between Plusle and Minun that deals [50,SP] SPECIAL. If Plusle or Minun are alone, deals this damage to adjacent enemies instead.
ability_description.MAGIC_BOUNCE: For [3,6,12] seconds, whenever this pokemon is hit by an ability, the caster is SILENCE for 4 seconds and take SPECIAL equal to this pokemon current SPE_DEF
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_A: Spawn 4 Abra at every corner of the board
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_B: Burn the opponent team for 30 seconds
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_C: Give Amulet Coin to your whole team. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_D: Get a Ditto on your bench
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_E: Get a Pokemon Egg on your bench. It hatches in the next stage
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_F: Fish 2 random WATER Pokemon at max fishing level
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_H: Heal your team to Max HP
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_K: Spawn Hitmonlee with a Red Orb and max MANA
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_L: Give Max Revive to your whole team. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_M: Your whole team gets max MANA
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_O: Give Oran Berry to your whole team. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_P: Spawn 5 random BUG pokemon at their first stage of evolution
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_Q: Immediately ends the fight with a draw
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_R: Spawn Geodude, Graveler and Golem with Rocky Helmets
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_S: FREEZE the opponent team for 4 seconds
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_T: Spawn Tapu-Lele with Choice Specs and max MANA
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_U: Spawn Uxie with Aqua Egg and max MANA
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_V: Cast $t(THUNDER) on all the enemy team
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_W: Get a high rarity pokemon matching your top synergy
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_X: Gives XRay Vision to your whole team. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_Y: Spawn 2 Meditite with a Soul Dew
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_Z: Put the enemy team SLEEP for 5 seconds
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_QM: Get 4 random Unown on your bench
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_EM: Spawn 4 random Unown at every corner of the board

effect_description.VICTORY_STAR: 20% chance to BURN, +1 ATK after every hit
effect_description.DROUGHT: 30% chance to BURN, +2 ATK after every hit
effect_description.DESOLATE_LAND: 40% chance to BURN, +3 ATK after every hit
effect_description.RAIN_DANCE: 30% chance to dodge. Fish a pokemon after every PvP fight.
effect_description.DRIZZLE: 50% chance to dodge. Rare pokemons can be fished.
effect_description.PRIMORDIAL_SEA: 70% chance to dodge. Epic pokemons can be fished.
effect_description.RISING_VOLTAGE: Every fourth attack is a triple attack
effect_description.OVERDRIVE: Every third attack is a triple attack
effect_description.LIGHT_SCREEN: +100% AP. Unowns have 5% chance to appear in shop.
effect_description.EERIE_SPELL: +150% AP. After a fight, get an Unown shop.
effect_description.IRON_DEFENSE: One of your steel Pokemon gains double base ATK
effect_description.AUTOMATE: All of your steel Pokemon gains double base ATK
effect_description.STEEL_SURGE: All of your steel Pokemon gains double base ATK. One gets triple base ATK
effect_description.VENOMOUS: 50% chance to POISON. Max stacks of POISON +1
effect_description.TOXIC: 70% chance to POISON. Max stacks of POISON +2
effect_description.DRAGON_ENERGY: Dragon's second synergy counts double (not the third)
effect_description.DRAGON_SCALES: Dragons gain 30 HP per evolution stage (3 for Mythicals)
effect_description.DRAGON_DANCE: Dragons gain 10% ATK_SPEED and 10% AP per evolution stage (3 for Mythicals)
effect_description.PURSUIT: When knocking down its target, gain 3 ATK and 30 max HP
effect_description.BRUTAL_SWING: When knocking down its target, gain 6 ATK and 60 max HP
effect_description.POWER_TRIP: When knocking down its target, gain 9 ATK and 90 max HP
effect_description.MEDITATE: Heal for 10% HP of the damage
effect_description.FOCUS_ENERGY: Heal for 25% HP of the damage
effect_description.CALM_MIND: Heal for 50% HP of the damage
effect_description.SWIFT_SWIM: 35% chance to burn 20 MANA and return 15 MANA to the attacker
effect_description.HYDRATION: 45% chance to burn 20 MANA and return 30 MANA to the attacker
effect_description.WATER_VEIL: 55% chance to burn 20 MANA and return 45 MANA to the attacker
effect_description.FEATHER_DANCE: Get PROTECT for 1.5 seconds after flying away
effect_description.MAX_AIRSTREAM: Fly away twice when under 50% HP and 20% HP
effect_description.MAX_GUARD: When flying away, enemies around are PARALYSIS for 2 seconds
effect_description.ALLEGRO: Ally team gains +1 ATK and +5% ATK_SPEED
effect_description.PRESTO: Ally team gains +1 ATK, +5% ATK_SPEED and 3 MANA
effect_description.DUBIOUS_DISC: Gain +10% base ATK, AP and max HP as SHIELD per held item
effect_description.LINK_CABLE: Gain +20% base ATK, AP and max HP as SHIELD per held item
effect_description.GOOGLE_SPECS: Gain +30% base ATK, AP  and max HP as SHIELD per held item
effect_description.HATCHER: 20% chance per consecutive defeat to get an Egg
effect_description.BREEDER: Get an Egg after each defeat against a player
effect_description.TELEPORT_NEXT_ATTACK: Next attack will deal additional SPECIAL
effect_description.SANDSTORM:
5 SPECIAL per second (GROUND are immune)
CONFUSION duration +30%
effect_description.RAIN:
+3 MANA per second
-30% BURN and POISON damage
effect_description.STORM:
Lightning randomly falls on the board (ELECTRIC are immune)
+30% PARALYSIS duration
effect_description.HYDRATATION: GRASS synergy is healing 5 additional HP per second under the RAIN

item_description.FOSSIL_STONE: A fossil of a Pokémon that lived in prehistoric times
item_description.OLD_AMBER: The holder gains the fossil type
item_description.DAWN_STONE: The holder gains the psychic type
item_description.WATER_STONE: The holder gains the water type
item_description.THUNDER_STONE: The holder gains the electric type
item_description.FIRE_STONE: The holder gains the fire type
item_description.MOON_STONE: The holder gains the fairy type
item_description.DUSK_STONE: The holder gains the dark type
item_description.LEAF_STONE: The holder gains the grass type
item_description.ICE_STONE: The holder gains the ice type
item_description.SOUL_DEW: During combat, the holder gains 8% ${Stat.AP} every second
item_description.UPGRADE: Successful attacks grant +4% bonus ${Stat.ATK_SPEED} for the rest of combat
item_description.REAPER_CLOTH: The holder spells can critically strike
item_description.POKEMONOMICON: When the holder deals ${Damage.SPECIAL}, they burn and wound the target for 3 seconds
item_description.POWER_LENS: 50% of incoming ${Damage.SPECIAL} is also dealt to the attacker
item_description.SHELL_BELL: Holder heals for 30% of all damages inflicted
item_description.LUCKY_EGG: +40% ${Stat.AP} for holder and adjacent allies in the same row
item_description.AQUA_EGG: The holder gains +50 starting ${Stat.MANA} and regains 20 ${Stat.MANA} after casting its ability
item_description.BLUE_ORB: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 2 enemies, burning 20 ${Stat.MANA}
item_description.SCOPE_LENS: Gains 25% ${Stat.CRIT_CHANCE}. Critical hits steal 15 ${Stat.MANA} from the target.
item_description.STAR_DUST: After casting ability, gain 60% of max ${Stat.MANA} as ${Stat.SHIELD}
item_description.DELTA_ORB: Holder and adjacent allies in the same row gain 4 bonus ${Stat.MANA} per hit
item_description.SMOKE_BALL: Enemies attacking the holder are ${Status.PARALYSIS} for 5 seconds, reducing their ${Stat.ATK_SPEED} by 40%
item_description.XRAY_VISION: +50% ${Stat.ATK_SPEED}. The holder attacks can no longer miss.
item_description.LEFTOVERS: During the combat, the holder attack heals adjacent allies on the same row for 5% of their max ${Stat.HP}
item_description.CHOICE_SCARF: On hit deal 50% basic attack damage to an adjacent enemy
item_description.FIRE_GEM: Attacks do double damage on ${Stat.SHIELD} and deal 10% of target max ${Stat.HP} as additional damage
item_description.DEFENSIVE_RIBBON: When the holder takes damage, gain 1 stack. Every 2 stacks, the holder gains +1 ${Stat.DEF}, +1 ${Stat.ATK} and +5% ${Stat.ATK_SPEED} (max 20 stacks)
item_description.WONDER_BOX: At the beginning of each battle, wonder box is replaced by 2 temporary items (max 3 items held)
item_description.RUNE_PROTECT: When combat begins, the holder and all adjacent allies receive ${Status.RUNE_PROTECT} for 6 seconds, making them immune to ${Damage.SPECIAL} and status alterations
item_description.FLUFFY_TAIL: Holder is immune to all status alterations
item_description.SHINY_CHARM: Give 15% chance to avoid incoming damage and trigger ${Status.PROTECT} for 1 second
item_description.GRACIDEA_FLOWER: When combat begins, the holder and adjacent allies in the same row gain +30% ${Stat.ATK_SPEED}
item_description.FLAME_ORB: Holder is burned but increase its ${Stat.ATK} by 100%
item_description.AMULET_COIN: +1 gold each time the holder knocks down an opponent (max 5 gold per stage)
item_description.RED_ORB: +10 ${Stat.ATK}. 25% of attack damage is dealt as ${Damage.TRUE}
item_description.MAX_REVIVE: Give ${Status.RESURECTION}, preventing the holder first KO and restoring to max ${Stat.HP}
item_description.ROCKY_HELMET: +12 ${Stat.DEF}. Negates critical bonus damage from incoming critical hits.

passive_description.TYROGUE: Will choose a combat discipline based on the first item given
passive_description.PROTEAN2: The pokemon acquires the typing of the 2 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.PROTEAN3: The pokemon acquires the typing of the 3 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.CASTFORM: Castform changes its form and the weather to ${Weather.SUN}, ${Weather.RAIN} or ${Weather.SNOW} depending on your dominant synergy between ${Synergy.FIRE} ${Synergy.WATER} ${Synergy.ICE}
passive_description.PHIONE: Phione is looking for an Aqua Egg
passive_description.PRIMAL: Legend has it that you could unleash the ancient powers of these pokemons
passive_description.WONDER_GUARD: Reduce received damage and received healing to 1
passive_description.ELECTRIC_SURGE: Give ${Status.ELECTRIC_FIELD} to your Electric Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.GRASSY_SURGE: Give ${Status.GRASS_FIELD} to your Grass Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.MISTY_SURGE: Give ${Status.FAIRY_FIELD} to your Fairy Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.PSYCHIC_SURGE: Give ${Status.PSYCHIC_FIELD} to your Psychic Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.EEVEE: Eevee can evolve into one of the 8 Eeveelutions when given a synergy stone
passive_description.TREE:
Pretends to be a tree and does not attack but gain 2 ${Stat.ATK} per second instead (stackable).
Starts attacking when ${Stat.MANA} bar is full
passive_description.DITTO: Ditto can't fight, but it can transform to create a copy of the basic form of one of your pokemons you drop it over (except Mythical and Hatch)
passive_description.EGG: You can feel something moving inside
passive_description.HATCH: Hatched pokemons evolve automatically after 4 stages
passive_description.SYNCHRO: If the pokemon is affected by ${Status.POISON}, ${Status.BURN}, ${Status.WOUND} or ${Status.SILENCE}, the enemy caster will suffer the same negative status
passive_description.TADPOLE: Poliwhirl will evolve into Poliwrath if placed on the frontlane, Politoed otherwise
passive_description.BIVALVE: Clamperl will evolve into Huntail if placed on the frontlane, Gorebyss otherwise
passive_description.AIRLOCK: Neutralize weather effects, getting back to ${Weather.NEUTRAL}
passive_description.WURMPLE: Wurmple can evolve into Silcoon or Cascoon, depending on the weather at previous stage
passive_description.HYDRATATION: ${Synergy.GRASS} synergy is healing 5 additional ${Stat.HP} per second under the ${Weather.RAIN}
passive_description.SHARED_VISION: Shared vision: all Pokemon with shared vision will attack the same target, if at range
passive_description.WATER_SPRING: Whenever an enemy uses their ability, gain 5 ${Stat.MANA}
passive_description.GIRATINA: Giratina switches between its Altered Forme and Origin Forme depending on its position on the board
passive_description.UNOWN: Unown cannot hold items and vanish after one fight or after casting their ability

stat_description.ATK: Damage inflicted on each basic attack
stat_description.ATK_SPEED: Number of attacks per second. Maximum 2.5.
stat_description.CRIT_CHANCE: Critical hits deal 2x more damage. Abilities cannot crit by default.
stat_description.CRIT_DAMAGE: Multiplier for critical hits additional damage
stat_description.MAX_MANA: Amount of mana required to cast ability. Pokemons receive mana with time (10 per second), when attacking (5 per attack) and when receiving damage (10% of incoming damage)
stat_description.AP: Increase SPECIAL and ability effects in various ways.
stat_description.SHIELD: Temporary health points, cannot be healed.

status_description.BURN: Deals 5% of max HP as ${Damage.TRUE} every second
status_description.POISON: Deals 5% of max HP per stack as ${Damage.TRUE} every second. Can stack up to 3 times by default. Reduce healing by 20% per stack.
status_description.PROTECT: Protects from any source of damage, but prevents ${Stat.MANA} gain
status_description.SLEEP: Prevents moving or attacking. Receiving attacks reduces the duration of the effect.
status_description.CONFUSION: Force to change target all the time and sometimes deal damage to itself
status_description.RESURECTION: Prevents KO once, restoring to max ${Stat.HP}

synergy_description.NORMAL: Normal pokemons and their adjacent allies gain ${Stat.SHIELD} when combat starts
synergy_description.FIRE: Fire pokemons gain ${Stat.ATK} after every hit and have a chance to ${Status.BURN} their enemies for 2 seconds
synergy_description.WATER: Water pokemons have a chance to dodge basic attacks. A new water pokemon is fished after each PvP turn and put on your bench.
synergy_description.ELECTRIC: Electric pokemons basic attacks can trigger two additional attacks
synergy_description.FIGHTING: Fighting pokemons block a flat amount of damage on every hit received
synergy_description.PSYCHIC: Psychic pokemons gain additional ${Stat.AP} and attract Unowns
synergy_description.DARK: Dark pokemons critical hits are more powerful and more frequent. Melee Dark pokemons jump to the farthest target reachable.
synergy_description.STEEL: Steel pokemons can multiply their base ${Stat.ATK}
synergy_description.GROUND: Ground pokemons gain bonus ${Stat.ATK}, ${Stat.DEF} and ${Stat.SPE_DEF} every 3 seconds, up to 5 times.
synergy_description.POISON: Poison pokemons have a chance to ${Status.POISON} their target for 4 seconds with their basic attacks. Poison inflicts ${Damage.TRUE} over time and reduce healing efficiency.
synergy_description.DRAGON: Dragon amplify synergies and gains more stats when fully evolved.
synergy_description.FIELD: When a field pokemon dies, all the other field pokemons are healed and gain ${Stat.ATK_SPEED}
synergy_description.MONSTER: Monster pokemons gain Attack, heal and increase their max HP, and grow in size every time they knock down an opponent
synergy_description.HUMAN: All your team heals for a percentage of the damage they deal with attacks and abilities
synergy_description.AQUATIC: Aquatic pokemons have a chance to steal ${Stat.MANA} from their target at every basic attack
synergy_description.BUG: At the start of the combat, the bug pokemons with the most ${Stat.HP} are duplicated
synergy_description.FLYING: Flying pokemons fly away when they fell under a certain amount of ${Stat.HP}
synergy_description.FLORA: When the first flora pokemon is dead, a flower will rise from its grave...
synergy_description.ROCK: Rock pokemons gain ${Stat.DEF} and better resist to critical damage
synergy_description.GHOST: Ghost pokemons have 50% chance to ${Status.SILENCE} on hit, and deal a percentage of their damage as ${Damage.TRUE}
synergy_description.FAIRY: Fairy pokemons shock nearby enemies whenever they deal or receive a critical strike
synergy_description.ICE: All allies gain ${Stat.SPE_DEF} and have a chance to ${Status.FREEZE} the enemy for 2 seconds after a hit
synergy_description.FOSSIL: On their first KO, fossil pokemons come back to life with increased ${Stat.ATK}
synergy_description.SOUND: Sound pokemons emit a cry when they use their abilities, waking up allies asleep and giving them bonus stats
synergy_description.ARTIFICIAL: Artificial pokemons gains ${Stat.ATK} and ${Stat.SHIELD} depending on the number of items held
synergy_description.BABY: Babies can bring you Pokemon Eggs to comfort you after a defeat

title_description.SKIER: Max Synergy With Ice Type in a game
title_description.POKEFAN: Max Synergy With Normal Type in a game
title_description.HEX_MANIAC: Max Synergy With Ghost Type in a game
title_description.MUSICIAN: Max Synergy With Sound Type in a game
title_description.BABYSITTER: Max Synergy With Baby Type in a game
title_description.ALCHEMIST: Max synergy with Artificial type in a game
title_description.GLITCH_TRAINER: Report a Bug without annoying Keldaan
title_description.NURSE: Heal 1000 or more in a single fight
title_description.GARDIAN: Shield 1000 or more in a single fight
title_description.DUCHESS: Own all the emotion of a single pokemon
title_description.ELITE_FOUR_MEMBER: Reach first 4 places of a tournament
title_description.ACE_TRAINER: Reach the final of a tournament
title_description.CAMPER: Max Synergy with Field Type in a game
title_description.RIVAL: Max Synergy with Human Type in a game
title_description.SURVIVOR: Win a game with only 1 HP remaining
title_description.GAMBLER: Reroll over 60 times in a single match
title_description.BOT_BUILDER: Reach level 10 to unlock the Bot Builder
title_description.ARCHEOLOGIST: Decipher the secret message of the Unowns

weather_description.STORM:
Lightning randomly strikes on the board, dealing 100 ${Damage.SPECIAL} (${Synergy.ELECTRIC} are immune)
+30% ${Status.PARALYSIS} duration

faq.official_game_answer: No, this is a fan game; made by fans, for fans. All rights/credits to Pokemon Company.
faq.how_pokemon_evolve_answer: You need 3 copies of the same pokemon to get the evolution. The 3 pokemons will merge to give the evolved pokemon. Hatch Pokemon that come from eggs evolve automatically with time every 5 stages.
faq.additional_synergies: Why is there field/flora/human/aquatic synergies ? They don't match any of pokemon types
faq.additional_synergies_answer: Field/Flora/Human/Aquatic are not pokemon types, but egg groups. Moreover, Fairy and Amorph/Ghost are both egg groups and synergies.
faq.income_answer: You get 5 gold per round whether you draw, win or lose. You get 1 bonus income per 10 gold saved. A maximum of 5 bonus income accrued at 50 saved gold. You get 1 bonus gold if you win. If you win multiple times, you will also gain extra gold; one bonus gold for every victory/defeat, up to 5 bonus gold for 5 streak wins / 5 streak defeat. Wins/Defeats against PVE are not taken into account.
faq.collection: What is the purpose of the collection/booster ?
faq.collection_answer: When opening boosters, you get pokemon shards. Those shards are specific to every pokemon. In the collection tab, you can buy pokemon emotions with those shards. You can see pokemon emotions as a detailed customization. When selecting an emotion pokemon portrait, the pokemon will appear everywhere with the same emotion portrait that you have selected. Eveyone will see the emotion that you picked for this pokemon. Moreover, if you have selected a shiny emotion, the pokemon will appear shiny to everyone else.
faq.avatars_answer: When buying a pokemon emotion, it will be available in your profile avatar list.
faq.boosters_answer: You gain boosters each time you level up.
faq.level_answer: You gain experience each time you finish a game. If you finish first, you'll get 700 xp, if you finish last, you'll get 100 xp.
faq.sprite: It seems some sprites are missing ?
faq.sprite_answer2: If you want the missing sprites to be added, please consider donating to pokemon autochess. Every donation will be used to pay spriters to make sprites for everyone.
faq.sprite_answer1: Sprites of pokemon auto chess are based on
faq.pve_answer: PVE are predefined waves of enemies. If you win against PVE, you'll get one Tier 1 item and you will have to choose one of 3 items propositions. PVE occurs at turn 1,2,3,9,14,19,24,29,34,39.
faq.mythical: What are those mythical pokemons ? When can I buy them ?
faq.mythical_answer: At turn 10 and 20, you'll have to choose between 6 mythical pokemons. Those mythical pokemons are very strong.
faq.ditto_answer: Ditto creates a plain copy of the unit you hover and drop it over. Ditto can't fight. Each pokemon in shop has a 0.5% chance to be a Ditto at every roll. You can't copy mythical pokemons.
faq.items_answer: After winning a PVE round, you will get a random basic item and you will be able to choose from 3 choices another basic item that suits you. You can combine two basic items to create a powerful tier 2 item. The crafting list of all items is available in the wiki, in the items section.
faq.bots_answer: Bots are created by other players. Bots are theme-based, a mewtwo bot will always have an mewtwo in its team at a certain time in the game. Bots follows a list of predefined patterns. But they will not behave the same from one game to an other. To improve their team, they need to win matches against other bots/players. If they always loose, they'll improve much more slowly.
faq.create_bot: Can i create my own bot ?
faq.create_bot_answer: Sure. You'll need to be at least level 10 to unlock the Bot Builder title. Then choose this title and a "Bot Builder" button will appear in the header. Read the instructions and submit your bot, it will be sent in the #bot-creation channel on Discord for a review by the bot reviewers team.
faq.elo: How does the elo system work ?
faq.elo_answer: The elo system in Pokemon Auto Chess works the same as in other elo based games like Chess, Lol, Starcraft etc... To gain elo points, you need to beat other players. The higher your opponent's elo, the more elo you will gain by defeating him, and vice versa. If you don't play for 10 days, your elo will start to decay (-10 elo/day).
faq.missing_points: I didn't get elo points in my last game, why ?
faq.missing_points_answer: The game needs to be finished in order to win/lose elo points. If someone is still in game, you need to wait. Bots do not give elo, only human players are accounted for elo rating. It is also possible that the game had elo disabled ("Just for fun" mode)
faq.damage: What are the special damages and physical damages ?
faq.damage_answer: Auto attacks mostly deal Physical damage, while Abilities mostly deal Special damage. Some abilities however can deal true damage or physical damage.
faq.defense: Can you tell me how defense works? Is it flat damage reduction?
faq.defense_answer: Same system as League of Legends: damage = atk * (hp / hp * (1+(0.1*def))). Defense works for physical damage, special defense for special damage
faq.shiny: How do you get shiny pokemons ?
faq.shiny_answer: You get experience points by playing games. With enough experience, you level up and get a booster pack. Each booster pack gives shards for random pokemon. Use these shards to purchase the shiny emotes of a pokemon in the Collection page, then you will get that one pokemon as a shiny ingame.
faq.support: How can i support the game ?
faq.mobile: Will there be a mobile version one day ?
faq.code: What language/library is used to code the game ?
faq.code_answer: TypeScript, Phaser, Colyseus. If you want to contribute

mobile_warning: This game is not adapted for mobile, play it on desktop
nintendo_warning: Non profit, open source. All rights to The Pokemon Company®
copyright: All rights to The Pokemon Company®
click_on_create_room: Click on Create Room to play!
boosters_hint: Play more games to level up and earn new boosters.
open_boosters_hint: Open boosters to unlock new avatars and complete your collection !
export_hint: You can export your current work by copy pasting the following data.   You can then import the bot data later.
bot_ready_submission: If you think that your bot is ready, you can submit your bot to the   discord community. Your bot will be reviewed in the discord channel   #bot-creation.
get_started_bot: Get started with an existing BOT or paste your own BOT data
current_edition_click: Click to change the current edition mode.
write_mode_hint: The WRITE mode allow you to place pokemons and items on the board.
erase_mode_hint: The ERASE mode allow you to erase pokemons from the board.
copy_current_step: Click to copy the current step.
paste_current_step: You can then paste this step later elsewhere.
paste_current_step_click: Click to paste the copied step on your current step.
paste_current_step_hint: It will replace the board of the current step with the one you copied.
help_create_bot: To create a bot, you need to fill a certain number of steps.   Each step represents the state of your bot at a moment in the game   The bot will start with the team defined on step 1. Then, it will go   to step 2 and so on   The team of the step 2 should always be stronger than the step 1   team   As the player cannot get more than 10 pokemons/step, your bot is not   allowed too.
author: Author
points_required_hint: Points required represent how much your bot needs to work to get to the next step
next_step_hint: Once your bot has acquired enough points, it will go to the next step
victory_step_hint: For a victory, your bot will get 1.5 point
defeat_step_hint: For a defeat or a draw, your bot will get 1 point
step_bot_hint: The more points you require, the longer the bot will stay on this step
how_to_make_a_bot_guide: How to make a bot Guide
additional_pokemon_hint: Each player picked two additional Pokemon to be available in all   players shop for this game.
lose_game_hint: You lose the game when you have no more Health Points
players_disconnected_hint: Players disconnected for more than 3 minutes are kicked out of the game. Game will start after 5 minutes max of loading no matter what.
passive_income_hint: Each stage, gain 5 gold + 1 extra gold if you won the previous battle.
victory_income_hint: Gain 1 bonus gold for every victory or defeat streak, up to 5 bonus gold.
additional_income_hint: Gain 1 bonus gold per 10 gold saved, up to 5 bonus income at 50 saved gold.
pick_additional_pokemon_hint: Pick an additional Pokemon. It will be available to everyone.
free_slot_hint: You must have one free slot on the bench, or two for Duos
increase_level_hint: Increase your level to raise your chances to get higher tier Pokémon.
team_size_hint: Increase your team size by leveling up
name: Name
anonymous_users_name_hint: Anonymous users cannot change their name.
enter_password: Enter a password for the room
just_for_fun_hint: This game is just for fun, no ELO gain/loss !
elligible_elo_hint: ✔ This game is elligible for ELO gain/loss.
not_elligible_elo_hint: ❌Games with bots only are not elligible for ELO gain/loss.
add_bot_or_wait_hint: dd bots or wait for more players to join your room
tutorial_work: for his work on tutorial videos !
weather_dominant_hint: The dominant type of pokemons on the board during a battle can influence the weather. The weather has various effects on all of your team's and opponent's pokemons.
weather_dominant_hint2: It will require at least 8 pokemons of this type on the board to change the weather. Some powerful pokemons also have the ability to change weather by their own.
